name: PackUnpackApkFile
friendlyName: Pack or unpack an apk file.
description: Pack or unpack an apk file after modifications have been made
author: Scott MacDougall

inputs.name: packOrUnpack
inputs.label: Pack or unpack
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether you want to pack or unpack an apk

inputs.name: apkPath
inputs.label: Path to apk
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the apk file you want to unpack.

inputs.name: unpackedApkPath
inputs.label: Path to unpacked APK
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the apk file you want to pack.

inputs.name: apkName
inputs.label: APK Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name you'd like to give the newly packaged apk.

inputs.name: apkToolArgs
inputs.label: ApkTool Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional aruments to pass to ApkTool

outputVariables.name: repackagedAPKFile
outputVariables.description: The resulting apk file after assets update. This needs to be re-signed.
